titles.title: Calling for a restoration of civil government in Thailand established by fair, free, democratic, and open elections and expressing solidarity with the people of Thailand in their desire for democracy.

Calling for a restoration of civil government in Thailand established by fair, free, democratic, and open elections and expressing solidarity with the people of Thailand in their desire for democracy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
Calls for a restoration of civil government in Thailand established by democratic and open elections.
Expresses solidarity with the people of Thailand in their desire for democracy.
